about_the_game:
◆Overview
『OWATA'S ACTION ONLINE』 is an online multiplayer 2D action FPS with super difficult.
In this game, the player "Owata," who dies instantly if he takes damage even once, has to clear numerous stages!
There are a variety of bosses in each stage, and you must defeat them while avoiding their attacks!
With the help of other players, you may be able to clear the difficult stages that are too painful to clear by yourself.

◆Super Brawl Mode
In Super Brawl mode, you can enjoy team and individual battles with other players.
Be accurate in hitting where you aim and lead your wannabe to victory!
Regular tournaments are held every year to test your skills!
Fight daily to become the strongest Owata!

◆Boss Rush Mode
This mode features bosses that have appeared in stages and limited edition bosses.
Cooperate with your allies to clear bosses that are impossible to clear alone!

◆Customization
You can change your outfit from a stylish pirate hat to cat ears. You'll be able to change your character's outfit from a stylish pirate hat to cat ears, and make them look as cool and cute as you like!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.8 GHz / AMD Athlon II X2 @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: SM3.0 DX9.0c level hardware (Nvidia GeForce 6800, ATI X1800 XT or higher)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.66 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 @ 3.0 GHz (or any Dual Core CPU)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 280, ATI HD 4800 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
